name: places/ChIJmRemOORYwokRPGewvp6-UfM
formattedAddress: 227 E 56th St, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 227 E 56th St, New York, NY 10022, USA

originalText.text:
This club lived up to the hype and then some! Yes, it’s more expensive than most but the quality is some of the best we’ve seen. The staff was super friendly from beginning to end, the facility has a fun club vibe with a colorful dance floor, and the attraction level of the other members was some of the best we’ve seen.

My wife even lost an earring that night so we reached out to see if they by chance had found it (we weren’t even sure if that’s where she lost is). They hadn’t but asked for a reference photo and a few days later they found it! Not only that, but they shipped it to our home being that we live out of state.

So yes, in every conceivable way Checkmate beats 99% of the clubs out there and most importantly, they are there to take care of you and make sure you have a great time. We can’t wait for the chance to return!

originalText.text: The best club in the world ! Only got couples, no fatties no uglies :) we were there the night Madonna showed up no other club gets celebrities and attractive couples like they do , when we are in NYC we go to checkmate when in Paris Le Chandelles, good job checkmate!

originalText.text:
Clean, fun and safe environment. As a person well within the lifestyle (17 years) and been to other clubs in the city I can honestly say this is the best place I’ve been to in the city.
The fact there is no single men and a very friendly and welcoming staff made me as a single woman feel very comfortable. The clientele are beautiful and very friendly. Definitely will be coming back.

originalText.text:
Took my gf for her first time and we had an amazing time.  Everyone was so nice and accepting, pretty, a great mix of couples..
definitely will come back for the NYE party.
